column4: Hey does anybody know if there is a VMware image of dapper drake around? I've been googling like crazy but I can't find one.
for VMware player i mean
just run dapper.  you won't be sorry.  ;)
hrm... how come?
security blanket?
need windows is pretty um...
for what app?
oh lord.  another person who fell into the drm trap.
all the more reason to firebomb apple.
don't say that.  just eat the pain and buy the cds or something.  mp3 stinks.
yah awful quality.  go with flac
um no.  crap quality.  not even close to cd.  not cheaper at all... most cd's these days are 9 bucks canadian and you get all the songs.
move.  laf.
well... if you go to www.apple.com i am pretty sure they have all the answers for your lovely problem.  it will probably involve a core duo (tm) (c) g6 and a apple enema though.
you should be able to vmware any iso
last time i checked.
ick.
umm...
Ick? Yes. Ick, but free.
itunes rocks apparently.  i don't know if there is a quick and dirty way to help you.
but since you are into keeping those music files, i have some 8tracks for you if you want.  :)
Arrogance only makes you look bad.
you should see my face, i already look bad.  it isn't arrogance.  just reality.  sometimes you can cut your losses.
